Darkfate::

Darkfate smiled devily when he saw how brave Darkmouse was and 
replied her "I've heard that he's comming..."

He replied to Destructor while he walked "It's a great new and a good 
advice... but we aren't organized, Killfest's troops, our new allies 
and the troops that I've sent will arrived tired and they might need 
reparation, plus we have this guy outside and we have to decide 
quickly an alliance with Alliance..." Darkfate said as if he was 
talking himself "We can't do a lot with tired troops and with an 
important question like Alliance in our hands "

Darkfate shook his head and asked to Drillbit "What do you think 
Drillbit?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Darkmouse::
> 
> Darkmouse takes out her pistol, walking beside DrillBit. "Ok. Hey, 
do 
> we have any news on Killfest?"
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> > ::DrillBit::
> > 
> > He opened a comm to all his troops on a incodded channel.
> > "Possible enemy will be entering the base. Be ready, but do not 
> strike
> > unless orders are given."
> > He then walks to the main entrance with DarkFate.
